title: Pan-Fried Trout Fillets
ingredients: ['4 (175g) fillets boneless, skinless rainbow trout', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh ginger', '4 spring onions, chopped']
